Package no.hiof.webframework.security

package no.hiof.webframework.security
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Authentication
    The Authentication class handles user authentication.
    FactoryAuth
    The FactoryAuth class provides a factory method for creating Authenticator and SMSCodeGenerator objects
    HtmlFormGenerator
    Utility class for generating HTML forms.
    LogInAuthentication
    The LogInAuthentication class handles user login using authentication and SMS verification.
    SHAPasswordEncryptionAlgorithm
    Implementation of the PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm interface that encrypts passwords using the SHA algorithm.
    SMSVerification
    The SMS class generates and sends verification codes via SMS.
    User
     
    UserController
     
    UserDatabase
     
    UserInputValidatorForLoginForm
    The UserInputValidatorForLoginForm class that contains methods for validating usernames and passwords
